com.almasb.fxgl.entity.control

Class ProjectileControl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.almasb.ents.AbstractControl
      • com.almasb.fxgl.entity.control.ProjectileControl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.almasb.ents.Control

    public class ProjectileControl
extends com.almasb.ents.AbstractControl
    Generic projectile control. Automatically rotates the entity based on velocity direction.
    Author:
    Almas Baimagambetov (AlmasB) (almaslvl@gmail.com)
